thread.title: Jeff Sanders
thread.title_full: Lucky Tackle Box reviewed by Jeff Sanders

author: Jeff Sanders
title: Jeff Sanders
text:
This is the only subscription-based company to which I subscribe. They have experienced some growing pains as they've become bigger, but I think they have worked out all the kinks...and their product is exceptional. Customer service is wonderful--Britni recently helped me out with redeeming a gift card. She is top-notch.
I love receiving my box each month. Some lures won't work in my local lake...but new techniques are always fun to try.
I get a lot out of their YouTube videos. The Live show is helpful too.
If you're thinking about subscribing, do it. You won't regret it.
